page.title: 06QUEEN'S HEAD HOTEL
page.content: Tucked away behind the{Queen's Head {Hotel}among the dereliction that was once{Haverton Hill}is a little oasis of colour and peace.A lovely garden of green grass and colourful borders of roses and bedding plants. The landlord was pictured in the local newspaper this summer trying to sow the seeds of pride back into this area. In the last four and a half years he has seen the area go down hill."There's a lot of nice people here and nearly everyone has a garden but a few think anything goes,"he said.He is offering prizes to the winners of his"best kept garden" contest in the hope that lazy diggers will"pull their socks up!"A judge from{Stockton Council's}Parks Dept. will be invited to pick the winners.
